word: It is a sad fact that not all the men who have come from America as workers have been a help and blessing. . . . They were not living in connection with God. . . . There are those who have not exercised wisdom in dealing with human minds, who have been too indifferent to reach out a hand warm with sympathy and earnest, intelligent love to help the ones Satan has tried to secure for His service. Circumstances consign every man, whatever his position, to a practical test; and the actual results of this test are offered to the world for inspection. . . .
